**Phantabear Holder Gathering in Singapore**

@PhantabearHolder

We are excited to announce that there will be a Phantabear holder gathering taking place in Singapore. The team will cover the expense of food&drink for this event. Special thanks to <@913398458487025725>for helping out in coordinating location planning of the event and for sponsporing the beverages. 
<@822483259890860103>-Poster Design
<@871487813911195669> -Event content coordination and execution

__Time__ï¼š Friday, Dec 16th 2022, 19:00-00:00, GMT+8
__Address__ï¼š**Overworked Gastrobar** ,  7 Keppel Rd ï¼Œ#01-08ï¼Œ S(089053) Beside this ba ku teh


All Phantabear  holders are invited to come and meet other! Each holder can bring a friend along!

If you would like to attend, please register your Discord ID and the number of people attending(1 or 2) in the following form:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y_Wbu9hgnrf8lbJkg39mfAYpjulLF1PiyNyzWVaMjnU/edit#gid=0

We will verify holder status at the venue with either of the following option:
Option 1: Open up your metamask and display your bear.
Option 2: Open up discord and display the @Phantabearholder role.

See u Bear Family â€¦ğŸ‰ ğŸ» ğŸ»

ğŸ» **Exclusive Perk for Bearos - "Jay Chou's Limited-edition Demo Space" Rare Digital Key Airdrop**ğŸµ

Rare Digital Keys have been airdropped to Bearos. Please refer the following steps to access to the Demo Space.
1. Please log in **Mints** with the mobile phone number you registered. -> https://www.mintstech.cn/
2. Please open the drop-down menu in the upper right corner of the interface, find "Personal Homepage", and then drop down to find "Digital Collection" to check whether the quantity matches the submitted one.
3. If your phone number is on the previously announced success list, but you have not received the airdrop, please create a ticket at <#922096944388665364> and contact the mod team.

ğŸ»**Exclusive Perk for Bearos - "Jay Chou's Limited-edition Demo Space" Rare Digital Key Airdrop**ğŸµ

Do you want to experience Jay Chou-Themed Metaverse Space? The metaverse space consists of 5 demos selected by Jay, including the hit tracks "Blue and White Porcelain", "Love before BC", "Sunny Day", "Stranded" and an unreleased tune "New York Subway". Holders can stream the songs and explore a Metaverse-like, Jay Chou-themed world using their self-created avatars. **A Rare Digital Key** will be airdropped to every Bearo to enjoy the ultimate audio-visual feast! (One PhantaBear gets one key. Please refer to the Mints Official Web to learn more about collectible digital key levels.)

ğŸ¼**Registration Time:** <t:1662193320:d> - <t:1662698760:d>
ğŸ¼**Airdrop Time:** <t:1662785160:d> - <t:1663217160:d>

ğŸ¼**How to participate:**

1. Sign up on **Mints** with mobile phone registering. The phone number will be your account number. The official page of Mints: https://mintstech.cn/
2. Go to the channel <#1014830332261957712> , click the robot button "Submit Information", and submit the phone number you registered on Mints. (This channel is only visible to PhantaBear holders.)
3. On the channel <#1014830332261957712>, click on the Alphabot button to link your Discord ID and PhantaBear wallet. Please refer to the guide below:

In order to accurately count the number of PhantaBear in the wallet and avoid false claims, we will use Alphabot developed by Apelist as a way to verify the wallet and Discord account. Please beware of the phishing scams and do not click unknown links that led you to scam websites.

A. Link wallet and Discord account. This step only requires signatures without any authorization/gas fees.

âš ï¸ Please make sure that the Discord account, phone number and other information you submitted is the same as the one linked in the above steps. Airdrops can only be delivered  after the team cross-validates.

âš ï¸ Please do not transfer the PhantaBear before the event ends. If you do, please resubmit.

B. If there are multiple wallets, please log out, link the new wallet, log in, and then connect to DC to submit. Multiple wallets can be submitted to the same Discord account, but must be logged out and in again and reconnected to Discord.

**ğŸ“¢ â€Come join the â€œPhantaBear Online Community Event Proposal Competitionâ€ NowğŸ“¢**

ğŸ»Hello Bearos! 
Starting from today we are hosting an **"Online Community Event Proposal Competition"** for the PhantaBear community! We would like to invite our very talented bearos to share some ideas with us, as we would like to build consensus among the stakeholders and shape the community together as a team. The prize of this competition will be funded by the "Phanta Treasure".

â­ï¸**Event Details**

1. Submission deadline
<t:1650470340>

2. Eligibility criteria
This competition is available to **ğŸ»PhantaBear holders** only

3. How to enter
 Please visit the google form below to submit your proposalğŸ”—:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSefizOy1hi__HuHTZDrYjdEJsJVHdwg5i1VuDfbJiPbj2iAvw/viewform?usp=pp_url

4. Prize
Champion: Macbook Pro 13"(256GB)
First runner up: iPad Pro 11â€(128GB)
Second runner up: Apple Watch 7
Honorable mention (2 spots): AirPods Pro

5. Event Calendar
<t:1649692740:D> - <t:1650470340:D>: Proposal Submission
<t:1650556740:D> - <t:1650643140:D>: 5 finalists will be shortlisted via an internal election conducted by a team from the event organizers( <@&921733712813637652>  <@&955005907455078450> )
<t:1650815940:D> - <t:1651247940:D>: A community-based election for the winner
<t:1651334340:D>: Winner announcement

6. Selection Process
Stage One: 5 finalists will be shortlisted among all the submissions via an internal election conducted by a team from the event organizers.

Selection criteria
a. Community Value(30%): Your proposal should include the 4 main themes including lifestyle, Trends, Art and Music to embrace the core value of â€œPhantaBearâ€
b. Create Positive Community Impact (40%): Use your observation power and creativity to submit a proposal that would improve community engagement with ongoing development
c. Feasibility (30%): Feasibility goals and potentials for ongoing development. It will also be evaluated based on the below criteria including the integration with discord or the current system, as well as a detailed timeline to execute your ideas

Stage Two: A community vote will be conducted among PhantaBear holders,  1 PhantaBear = 1 vote and the proposal with the highest vote will be the champion of this competition. We will prioritize the proposal submitted by the champion, and the proposals submitted by other award winners might be used in upcoming events.

7. Things to note
1ï¼‰Please note that all submissions should be unpublished original work, Plagiarism and copyright infringement are both offenses liable to punishment
2ï¼‰In order to maintain an Electoral system, the identity of shortlisted candidates will remain confidential until we announce the winner of this competition
3 Discord account will be used for identity verification in this event. Please link your discord account and wallet on our official
websiteğŸ”—: https://ezek.io/. Please refer to  <#937187635879870484> if you have any questions on how to link your wallet with Discord account
4ï¼‰Please refer to <#922392258916016169> to learn about "Phanta Treasure"
5ï¼‰Summitting a proposal of this competition through the google form attached represents the participant's understanding, acceptance, and willingness to comply with the terms and conditions for this activity
6ï¼‰By participating in The Activity, the copyright of the Award-winning work
Will be co-owned by the content creator and the organizers. The foregoing license shall provide the right to the organizers of this event to copy, edit, publish and disseminate the Award-winning work
